businessSourceSummaries.title: Business Source Summaries
businessSourceSummaries.description: The array holding Business Source Accounting Summary (BSAS) Entries, by Business Income Source

typeOfBusiness.title: Type of Business
typeOfBusiness.description: The type of business the loss applies to

selfEmploymentId.title: Self-Employment ID
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer

accountingPeriod.title: Accounting Period
accountingPeriod.description: The duration of the business income source operations to be included in the tax year submission. 2019-20 is the earliest tax year to which the accounting period can be assigned

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The date the accounting period began

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The date the accounting period finished. The accounting period must end in the tax year to which it is assigned. For MTD submissions 2019-20 is the earliest tax year in which an accounting period can end

bsasEntries.title: BSAS Entries
bsasEntries.description: The array holding Business Source Accounting Summary (BSAS) Entries

id.title: BSAS ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the summary calculation

requestedDateTime.title: Requested Datetime
requestedDateTime.description: The date and time this summary calculation was originally requested, prior to any adjustments

summaryStatus.title: Summary Status
summaryStatus.description: Whether the summary calculation with this ID is current, has been invalidated (by subsequent data entry) or has been superseded by a more recent request for a summary calculation

adjustedSummary.title: Adjusted Summary
adjustedSummary.description: Indicates whether the original summary calculation has had adjustments applied
